questions.questionTitle: Who most likely are the speakers?
What is the woman planning to do?
What does the man say about vacation requests?
anwers: They must be submitted by July
The woman doesn't have a good chance
First-year employees do not get vacations

script:
� Hey Mark, what's the policy for vacation requests? I'd like to take time off in July, when the kids are out of school.
� You and everybody else. You've got to submit a form to Human Resources. It's first come, first serve, based on seniority.
� I see. My chances wouldn't be very good then, would they? Maybe I should try for February, when the kids have mid-winter break.
